name: 10 Seconds or Less (Kleinzach)
description:
In the near future, competition in the pizza delivery space has grown so fierce, that the only way to compete is to promise delivery times as low as possible. Scientists at your employer have made a breakthrough, time travel. There is now no limit to making your deliveries* in 10 Seconds or Less**.

* From the customer's frame of reference.

** Otherwise it is coming out of your paycheck.

How to Play:

  • Hold W/S or Up/Down arrow to move.
  • Hold A/D or Left/Right arrow to strafe.
  • Press Space to Jump.
  • Collect Stop Watches to allow time travel.
  • Hold Shift to reverse the time of the world, assuming you collected enough stop watches.
  • Reach the customer at the end of the level, hopefully in less then 10 seconds.
  • Collect all of the letters in "PIZZA" on each level in a single challenge run. Collect them all in a single run, to unlock... nothing since this I didn't have time. It just changes the color of the stage in the Level Select.
  • Levels are not unlocked, feel free to skip one if you find it too hard.
  • Press Escape to return to the Main Menu

Tools Used:

  • Unity
  • Magica Voxel
  • Audacity
  • Beep Box
  • Visual Studio

All art, audio, and code created by me in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam
